SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
INSERT INTO pay_trans_record_scan (ptr_transModeId,ptr_transModeName,ptr_merParentId,ptr_merId,ptr_providerAccId,ptr_providerMchNo,ptr_productId,ptr_productName,ptr_ralAccProductId,ptr_outTradeNo,ptr_amount,ptr_actulAmt,ptr_state,ptr_stateMsg,ptr_stateRemark,ptr_type,ptr_srcOutTradeNo,ptr_outTransactionId,ptr_terminalIP,ptr_goodsName,ptr_goodsDesc,ptr_bizOrderNo,ptr_notifyUrl,ptr_resultUrl,ptr_payWayUserId,ptr_spTransactionId,ptr_spTransTime,ptr_spTransDate,ptr_spRespCode,ptr_spRespMsg,ptr_providerFee,ptr_providerFeeRate,ptr_merFee,ptr_merfeeRate,ptr_noticeState,ptr_settleState,ptr_createTime,ptr_updateTime) SELECT * FROM (
SELECT #{transModeId} as ptr_transModeId, #{transModeName} as ptr_transModeName, #{merParentId} as ptr_merParentId, #{merId} as ptr_merId, #{providerAccId} as ptr_providerAccId, #{providerMchNo} as ptr_providerMchNo, #{productId} as ptr_productId, #{productName} as ptr_productName, #{ralAccProductId} as ptr_ralAccProductId, #{outTradeNo} as ptr_outTradeNo, #{amount} as ptr_amount, #{actulAmt} as ptr_actulAmt, #{state} as ptr_state, #{stateMsg} as ptr_stateMsg, #{stateRemark} as ptr_stateRemark, #{type} as ptr_type, #{srcOutTradeNo} as ptr_srcOutTradeNo, #{outTransactionId} as ptr_outTransactionId, #{terminalIP} as ptr_terminalIP, #{goodsName} as ptr_goodsName, #{goodsDesc} as ptr_goodsDesc, #{bizOrderNo} as ptr_bizOrderNo, #{notifyUrl} as ptr_notifyUrl, #{resultUrl} as ptr_resultUrl, #{payWayUserId} as ptr_payWayUserId, #{spTransactionId} as ptr_spTransactionId, #{spTransTime} as ptr_spTransTime, #{spTransDate} as ptr_spTransDate, #{spRespCode} as ptr_spRespCode, #{spRespMsg} as ptr_spRespMsg, #{providerFee} as ptr_providerFee, #{providerFeeRate} as ptr_providerFeeRate, #{merFee} as ptr_merFee, #{merfeeRate} as ptr_merfeeRate, #{noticeState} as ptr_noticeState, #{settleState} as ptr_settleState, #{createTime} as ptr_createTime, #{updateTime} as ptr_updateTime FROM DUAL
) A

ptr_id = #{id},
ptr_transModeId = #{transModeId},

ptr_amount = #{amount},

ptr_state=#{state},
ptr_stateMsg=#{stateMsg},
ptr_stateRemark=#{stateRemark},
ptr_type=#{type},
ptr_srcOutTradeNo=#{srcOutTradeNo},
ptr_outTransactionId=#{outTransactionId},
ptr_terminalIP=#{terminalIP},
ptr_goodsName=#{goodsName},
ptr_goodsDesc=#{goodsDesc},
ptr_bizOrderNo=#{bizOrderNo},
ptr_notifyUrl=#{notifyUrl},
ptr_resultUrl=#{resultUrl},
ptr_payWayUserId=#{payWayUserId},
ptr_spTransactionId=#{spTransactionId},
ptr_spTransTime=#{spTransTime},
ptr_spTransDate=#{spTransDate},
ptr_spRespCode=#{spRespCode},
ptr_spRespMsg=#{spRespMsg},
ptr_providerFee = #{providerFee},

ptr_merFee = #{merFee},
ptr_merfeeRate=#{merfeeRate},
ptr_noticeState=#{noticeState},
ptr_settleState=#{settleState},
ptr_createTime=#{createTime},
ptr_updateTime=#{updateTime}
WHERE ptr_id = #{id}
